response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 by both parties. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is an exceptional value considering its market worth and the benefits it offers. I believe this price reflects the unique opportunity for you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
